import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { singlePerson } from '../actions'; import '../css/NavBar.css'; const InPerson = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(singlePerson()) },[]) const singlePeople = useSelector((state) => state.singlePeople) console.log(singlePeople) return (
